name: dressed in red
description:
dressed in red is a light-hearted interactive fiction game about being a vampire loan-shark and:

  • bartering for people's blood
  • meeting weird characters
  • competing against other vampires (by running a morally questionable protection-money scheme for the people in your town)
  • summoning bats, but only a little bit

this game was made for ludum dare #44: your life is currency!

game by: fancy pigeons 

@ffancypigeons
